ProductInfo.Features:
ACTi E62 (3MP Indoor Dome with D/N, IR, Basic WDR, Vari-focal lens, f2.8-12mm/F1.4, H.264, 1080p/30fps, DNR, MicroSDHC, PoE)
Progressive Scan CMOS | Day and night function with mechanical IR cut filter | Minimum illumination 0 lux with IR LED on
Built-in f2.8~12mm / F1.4 Megapixel vari-focal lens | 15 fps at 2048 x 1536 resolution | Selectable H.264 HP, MJPEG compressions with dual streaming
Video motion detection | Basic WDR | MircoSDHC card slot for local storage
Powered by PoE Class 2
ProductInfo.Name: ACTi E62 3MP Vari-focal Indoor Dome Network Camera, POE, IR, D/N
